description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. AVATOUR - VEGAS Edition.   Take a Tour of Vegas. Use 4D Power to go thru Objects, and use AntiGravity Power to Fly. Also, Drive a Car, Boat, Helicopter, Jet or Walk with Your Avatar.    GAMES.ARCHOR.COM
